attributes.action: Stop Banks Charging customers until the test case has been heard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The FSA has allowed banks to put a hold on all cases reclaiming bank charges until the test case has been completed. I feel it is ony fair that the banks are also told to put a hold on ALL bank charges until this case is heard.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
